title: A Curious and diverse flora. Pt. 1: Botany Bay
creator_credit: Tony Chenn, Nicholas Alexander, Australian Academy of Science and CSIRO
brief_description: This film notes the profusion of previously unknown species of plants discovered by Joseph Banks at Botany Bay, such as banksias, the heath-like epacridaceae, the grass-like restionaceae, boronias, xanthorrhoeas, casuarinas and eucalypts. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
